BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Watcher history index has too many indexed fields - (#71479) (#117701) * Exclude result.input.chain from watcher history index mappings * Update docs/changelog/117701.yaml * Fixup text now fields are disabled higher up the chain * Revert priority change
